gameRatingDescriptionLong: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

i18n.longDescription:
Get the edge and take back the Liberty Dome. New York City may be in crisis, but you're not about to back down. Turn the odds in your favor with an arsenal of powerful new weapons and special ammo, right from the start. Unlock extra content and take down your enemies.

Unlock powerful weapons. Instantly unlock the Predator Bow from the Crysis 3 Hunter Edition. Plus, unlock the Explosive Arrow so you can surprise enemies with a nice, big boom. Then, unleash destruction with the Typhoon submachine gun at 500 rounds per second. Still not enough? Finish off the enemy with the powerful Gauss Rifle.

Upgrade your gear. Show everyone who's taking back the Liberty Dome with custom skins for the Gauss Rifle, Typhoon, SCAR rifle, and Predator Bow. Plus, you'll get the Rapid-Fire Nanosuit mod, which increases a weapon's rate of fire so you can burn through ammo -- and your enemies -- faster.

Complete the experience. Relive the glory of taking back New York City -- and Earth -- long after you've completed the game with the official Crysis 3 soundtrack.

Requires Crysis 3 base game (sold separately) to play.
i18n.onlineDisclaimer:
INTERNET CONNECTION REQUIRED FOR PRODUCT ACTIVATION. INTERNET CONNECTION, EA Account, ACCEPTANCE OF PRODUCT AND ORIGIN END USER LICENSE AGREEMENTS (EULAS) AND INSTALLATION OF THE ORIGIN CLIENT SOFTWARE (WWW.ORIGIN.COM/AU/ABOUT) REQUIRED TO PLAY AND ACCESS ONLINE SERVICES. YOU MUST BE 13+ TO ACTIVATE SOFTWARE, ACCESS ONLINE FEATURES, AND REGISTER FOR AN EA Account.  REGISTRATION WITH SINGLE-USE SERIAL CODE ENCLOSED WITH NEW, FULL RETAIL PURCHASE REQUIRED TO ACCESS CERTAIN BONUS CONTENT (IF ANY). REGISTRATION FOR CERTAIN BONUS CONTENT (IF ANY) IS LIMITED TO ONE EA Account PER SERIAL CODE, WHICH IS NON-TRANSFERABLE ONCE USED. EA ONLINE PRIVACY POLICY AND TERMS OF SERVICE CAN BE FOUND AT WWW.EA.COM.   EULAS AND ADDITIONAL DISCLOSURES CAN BE FOUND AT WWW.EA.COM/1/PRODUCT-EULAS. BONUS DOWNLOADABLE CONTENT WILL BE AVAILABLE SO LONG AS ONLINE SERVICES FOR THE GAME ARE AVAILABLE. EA MAY RETIRE ONLINE FEATURES AND ONLINE SERVICES AFTER 30 DAYS NOTICE POSTED ON WWW.EA.COM/1/SERVICE-UPDATES. EA MAY PROVIDE CERTAIN INCREMENTAL CONTENT AND/OR UPDATES FOR NO ADDITIONAL CHARGE, IF AND WHEN AVAILABLE. 

PLEASE NOTE: ONLINE MULTIPLAYER SUPPORT FOR CRYSIS, CRYSIS 2 AND CRYSIS: WARS IS PROVIDED BY GAMESPY AND THE COMPANY HAS DEACTIVATED THESE SERVICES. THIS CHANGE WILL NOT AFFECT THE SINGLE-PLAYER CAMPAIGN, CRYSIS 3 MULTIPLAYER OR ANY ADDITIONAL ORIGIN FEATURES. FOR MORE DETAILS, PLEASE READ EA’S ONLINE SERVICE UPDATES PAGE.
i18n.systemRequirements:
MINIMUM:

• OS: Windows Vista (SP2), Windows 7 (SP1) or Windows 8
• CPU: 2.4 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.7 GHz AMD Athlon 64X2
• RAM: At least 2 GB / 3 GB for Windows Vista
• DISC DRIVE: DVD ROM drive required for installation only
• HARD DRIVE: At least 17 GB of free space
• VIDEO: DirectX 11 graphics card with 1 GB Video RAM or better / NVidia GTS 450 or AMD Radeon HD5770
• DirectX: DirectX 11 required
• INPUT: Keyboard and mouse, or dual analog controller
• ONLINE CONNECTION REQUIREMENTS:256 KBPS or faster Internet connection

itemName: Crysis 3 Digital Deluxe Upgrade Pack - PCDD - WW (Origin.com)
